item.title: Etsy reminds us that information security is an active process
item.description: I’m always impressed with the content published by folks at Etsy and Ben Hughes’ presentation from DevOpsDays Minneapolis 2014 is no exception.

item.title: DevOps and enterprise inertia
item.description: As I wait in the airport to fly back home from this year’s Red Hat Summit, I’m thinking back over the many conversations I had over breakfast, over lunch, and during the events.

item.title: Information security nuggets from DevOps Weekly #150
item.description: Keeping an eye out for the DevOps Weekly email is something I’ve enjoyed since it started at the end of 2010.
